Class Clock

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Clock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISound
    public class Clock
extends greenfoot.Actor
implements ISound
    Clock is a Greenfoot actor that shows the time rest for the pizza to be cooked.

    Displays new a clock image after a certain time passes

    Version:
    November 2022
    Author:
    Yuxin Li

      • Clock

        public Clock​(int time,
             Pizza pizza)
        Clock is a Greenfoot actor that shows the time rest for the pizza to be cooked.
        Parameters:
        time - The amount of time required to cook a pizza
        pizza - The pizza that is put into an oven

        public void act()
